DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect new wearable hip assist robot develop Samsung Advanced Institute Technology ( Samsung Electronics Co , Ltd. , Korea ) gait rehabilitation elderly adult stroke patient .
DOC.brief_title: Gait Pattern Analysis Feasibility Gait Training With Walking Assist Robot Stroke Patients Elderly Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized , two treatment group Number Subjects : 54 subject ( n=27 per group ) Group 1 : gait rehabilitation hip assist robot / 10 session ( 5sessions - treadmill gait train / 5sessions - overground gait training ) , 30min per session Group 2 : gait rehabilitation without hip assist robot / 10 session ( 5sessions - treadmill gait train / 5sessions - overground gait training ) , 30min per session Primary objective demonstrate effect hip assist robot spatio-temporal parameter measure motion capture system ( Motion Analysis Corporation , Santa Rosa , CA , USA ) , muscle activation pattern measure surface electromyography ( sEMG ) ( Noraxon Inc. , Scottsdale , AZ , USA ) , metabolic energy cost parameter measure portable cardiopulmonary metabolic system ( Cosmed K4B2 , Rome , Italy ) foot pressure distribution measure F-Scan Mobile system ( Tekscan Inc. , South Boston , MA , USA ) . Secondary objective demonstrate effect hip assist robot motor function improvement evaluate Berg Balance Scale ( BBS ) , Tinetti performance orient mobility assessment ( POMA ) , Korean version Modified Bathel index ( K-MBI ) , Modified Rankin Scale ( MRS ) , Functional Ambulation Classification ( FAC ) , Fugl-Meyer assessment low extremity ( FMA ) , Korean version Fall Efficacy Scale ( K-FES ) , Manual Muscle Test ( MMT ) Range Motion ( ROM ) .
